biotools.summary: Combines both thermodynamic and kinetic factors for RNA secondary structure and can predict RNA secondary structures from single primary sequences. Our early work has shown the accuracy of it is higher than the accuracy of traditional methods, especially for RNAs without pseudoknots.

bioschemas.name: FledFold
